_header: As Thou for Holy Church right
_description: Prayer to Christ, with an ‘0 and I’ refrain — sixteen lines in cross-rhymed quatrains and couplets

BodDou128.First Lines:
As þou for holy churche riȝtbare þe blody
                    face…
BodDou128.Last Lines:
…Wiþ an O & an I my wonynge is wel wykkeffrendes haue
                    y fewe my fomen walkeþ þykke
